Find warm Kashmiri hospitality at Conifer View Guest House

Conifer View Guest House is a cozy mountain homestay in Tangmarg — the peaceful gateway to Gulmarg. Set on Iqbal Colony Road, the house offers warm Kashmiri hospitality, clean rooms, and views of pine-clad slopes.
It's a practical base for gondola rides, skiing in winter, and day trips to Drung Waterfall. Our family-run guest house provides a "feel at home while away from home" experience.
The Tangmarg–Gulmarg road can require snow chains or 4×4 vehicles after fresh snowfall. Contact us for the latest road conditions.
"This was a beautiful hotel with amazing staff. The location is perfect for exploring Gulmarg and the hospitality was exceptional."
